inclusion.criterion: Confirmed diagnosis of symptomatic MM based on standard criteria.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: No prior or current systemic therapy for MM, including steroids.
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: At least 18 years and less than 65 years of age.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Presence of quantifiable M protein in serum (e.g. greater than 1 g/dL for IgG MM, greater than 0.5 g/dL of IgA or IgD MM) or urine (e.g. greater than 200 mg/day for BJ MM).
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Willing and able to comply with the protocol requirements.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Adequate organ function, including heart, liver, kidney (serum creatinine less than 2 mg/dL).
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Platelet count at least 70 x 10/mcL and absolute neutrophil count at least 1 x 10/mcl.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Agreement from both male and female patients to follow the risk management program established for the prevention of pregnancy, including double methods for contraception and beta-HCG tests for women of childbearing potential and contraception for males.
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Diagnosis of asymptomatic MM or of MGUS based on standard criteria.
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Patient has received other investigational drugs within 30 days before enrollment.
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has multiple myeloma with recurrent disease and systemic amyloidosis. She is on hemodialysis for ESRD and represents for malaise, weakness, and generalized body aching.
